experience.title: Experience & Education
experience.subtitle: My professional journey and educational background.

descriptions: Developed and maintained web applications using React and TypeScript
Implemented responsive designs and optimized performance
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality products
Built and tested new features for the company's main product
Participated in code reviews and team meetings
Assisted in debugging and troubleshooting issues

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: I'm a passionate software engineer with a focus on creating elegant, efficient solutions to complex problems. Here's a bit about who I am and what I do.

story.title: My Story
paragraphs: With over 7 years of experience in software development, I've had the opportunity to work on a diverse range of projects as an independent contractor and a full-time startup employee.
I discovered my passion for programming during college, where I built my first web applications. Since then, I've been constantly learning and pushing the boundaries of what I can create.
What drives me is the ability to solve real-world problems through code, and the satisfaction of seeing users benefit from the solutions I build.

cleanCode.title: Clean Code
cleanCode.description: I write maintainable, well-tested code following best practices.

collaborative.title: Collaborative
collaborative.description: I thrive in team environments and value communication.

problemSolver.title: Problem Solver
problemSolver.description: I enjoy tackling complex challenges with creative solutions.

detailOriented.title: Detail Oriented
detailOriented.description: I pay attention to the small details that make big differences.

interests.title: Personal Interests
interests.description: When I'm not coding, you can find me on the dance floor, reading tech and nonfiction books, volunteering or attending events to stay connected with the community.

hero.description: Expertise in building scalable systems, optimizing performance, improving system stability, and mentoring team members in fast-paced environments.

skills.title: Skills & Expertise
skills.subtitle: I've developed a diverse set of skills throughout my career. Here's an overview of my technical expertise and proficiency levels.

projects.title: Featured Projects

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.subtitle: Have a project in mind or want to discuss potential opportunities? Feel free to reach out!
contact.infoDescription: Feel free to reach out to me through any of these channels. I'm always open to discussing new projects, opportunities, or partnerships.
contact.availabilityDescription: I'm currently <1>available</1> for freelance work or full-time positions. My typical response time is within 24 hours.
